ContentSnippet.Name: StyleSub
ContentSnippet.ContentSnippet:
<style><!--
#principle {
		background: url(../images/principles.png);
		height:171px; 
		width:343px; 
	}

	#principle:hover { 
		background-position: -345px 0px;
		width: 342px;
	}

	#honor_code {
		background: url(../images/honor_code.png);
		height:171px; 
		width:345px; 
	}

	#honor_code:hover { 
		background-position: -345px 0px;
		width: 345px;
	}

	.link_span{ 
		display: block;
		width: 100%;
		height: 100%;
	}  

	#honor_content {
		float: left;
		border: 1px solid #999;
	}

	#honor_nav {
		font-size: 9px;
	}

	#honor_nav ul {
		list-style-type:none;
		padding-top: 10px;
		font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	}

	#honor_nav li {
		display: inline;
		font-weight: bold;
		text-transform: uppercase;
		padding-left: 0px;
		padding-right: 1px;
	}

	#honor_nav a{
		color: #000;
		text-decoration:none;
	}

	#honor_nav a:hover{
		color: #FFA800;
	}

	.orange {
		color: #FFA800;
	}

	#honor_topic {
		margin-left: 5px;
		background-color: #FFF8EB;
		width: 700px;
	}

	#topic_head {
		background-color: #FFA800;
		color: #FFF;
		padding-top: 7px;
		padding-bottom: 7px;
		padding-left: 15px;
		border-top-left-radius: 5px;
		-moz-border-top-left-radius: 5px;
		border-top-right-radius: 5px;
		-moz-border-top-right-radius: 5px;
	}

	.current_page{
		color:#FFA800;
	}


	.honor_topic_content {
		width: 	330px;
		float: left;
		padding-left: 10px;	
		padding-right: 10px;
		font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-size: 16px;
		padding-top:22px;
	}

	.honor_topic_content h3 {
		font-size: 18px;
		font-family: Helvetica, Arial;
	}

	#honor_policy{
		padding-bottom:10px;
	}

	#honor_policies {
		margin-top: 32px;
		margin-left: 5px;
		width: 700px;
		float: left;
		padding-left: 10px;
	}

	#honor_policies h3 {
		font-size: 17px;
		font-family: Helvetica, Arial;	
		color: #FFA800;
		text-transform: uppercase;
	}

	.span-5 p {
		font-style: italic;	
		font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-size: 14px;
		margin-bottom: 10px;
		margin-top:20px;
	}

	.span-12 ul{
		font-family: Helvetica, Arial;
		font-size: 14px; 
		list-style-type:none;
		margin-left: -20px;
		border-left: 1px solid #999;
	}

	.span-12 li {
		padding: 2px;
	}

	.span-12 ul li{
		padding: 2px;
		list-style-type:none;
	}

	.span-12 a{
		color:#737373;
		text-decoration:none;
	}

	.span-12 a:hover{
		color: #FFA800;
	}

	#honor_quote{
		float:left;
		margin-top:30px;
		width:710px;
		/*border-bottom:2px dotted #737373;*/	
	}


	#honor_quote h3, #honor_vid h3{
		text-transform:uppercase;
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-style:italic;
		font-size:17px;
		color:#737373;
		letter-spacing:1px;
	}

	#honor_quote p{
		float:left;
		color:#37758f;
		font-style:italic;
		font-size:13px;
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		width:600px;	
	}

	#honor_quote img{
		float:left;
		padding-right:10px;
		width:72px;	
	}

	#honor_quote a{
		text-transform:uppercase;
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-size:13px;
		font-style:italic;
		color:#737373;
	}
	#honor_vid{
		float:left;
		margin-top:20px;
		width:710px;
	}

	#honor_policies .span-5 ul li{
		font-family: Helvetica, Arial;
		font-size: 14px; 
		list-style-type:none;
		margin-left: -20px;
		color:#000;
		padding-top:10px;
	}

	#honor_policies .span-5 li{
		padding-bottom:10px;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-5 a{
		color:#000;
		text-decoration:none;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-5 a:hover{
		color:#FDAA00;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-5, #honor_policies .span-11{
		margin-top:-20px;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-11 h3{
		padding-top:10px;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-11 h6{
		font-size:12px;
		margin-left:-45px;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-11 p{
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-size:14px;
		color:#000;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-11{
		border-left:1px solid black;
		padding:0px 20px 20px 20px;	
	}

	#honor_policies .span-11 ul{
		color:#000;
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
		font-size:14px;	
	}

	#honor_policies_lower{display: none;
		font-style:italic;
		margin-top:25px;
		float:left;
		font-family:Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;	
	}

	#honor_policies_lower h4{
		color:#989898;
	}

	#honor_question{
		color:#000;
	}

	#honor_question{
		margin:none;
	}

	#question_even{
		background-color:#FFF7E5;
		padding:15px 10px 1px 10px;
	}

	#question_odd{
		padding-top:30px;
		padding-left:10px;
		padding-right:10px;
		
	}

	#question_text{
		font-size:13px;	
	}

	#additional{display:none;
		background-color:#FDAA00;
		color:#FFF;
		float:right;
		text-align:right;
		font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
		font-size:17px;
		padding-right:300px;
		padding-left:4px;
		margin-right:-2px;
		padding-bottom:2px;
	}

	#additional img{
		padding-right:5px;
		padding-top:2px;	
	}
--></style>
